segments.text: Hi , I was just coming to see you.But since you made the trek to my office , you get to go first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I'm putting together a report on the Allied Marketing Co . failure , and I seem to have run into a stone wall . Can you help me out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I can try , what do you need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You were there when the problem started . I was hoping you could fill me in on the details .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , no problem.But I need something from you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm supposed to have this package ready for mailing out tomorrow morning and I'm miles away from being ready.Can you edit this product study I wrote while I do these ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , I can do that , and as soon as we finish this , we can both work on my problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Give me the study . I'll start as soon as I get back to my office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here's a print out of the study , and this is a disc with the full report on it.The file name is product study , this is and extra copy so you can do whatever you want with it .
segments.speaker: S2
